# Yet Another RSA Challenge - Part2

__Description__

If not done already, you should probably attempt Part 1 of this challenge (in the Crypto category).

[Same player, shoot again.](https://static.ctf.insecurity-insa.fr/80b4175896560b143276d9ca5aa3e39a8ac4f613.tar.gz)

__Solution__

這題和Part 1很像但是output的p被魔改了一番：

```
print '0x'+p.replace('12','8D').replace('33','D4').replace('5E','FF').replace('09','95').replace('E4','38').replace('6B','89').replace('9E','E0').replace('59','3E')
```

所以我寫了[程式](yep.py/)每次找到符合的子字串換回來，試了一分鐘左右找到符合的p:

```

```

之後跟part 1一樣找到d=65537對(p-1)x(q-1)的模反元素e，再算出明碼就拿到flag了

```
>>>mod(m,e,N)
2888401806719289566529258219029898403437008603680246205323034392877650924161656820246966472437123432581541045306157181
>>>hex(2888401806719289566529258219029898403437008603680246205323034392877650924161656820246966472437123432581541045306157181)
'0x494e53417b55685f6e657665725f676976655f347734795f796f75725f5072316d65735f495f6d33346e5f64756868687d'
>>>codecs.decode('494e53417b55685f6e657665725f676976655f347734795f796f75725f5072316d65735f495f6d33346e5f64756868687d','hex')
b'INSA{Uh_never_give_4w4y_your_Pr1mes_I_m34n_duhhh}'
```
